main.name: Welcome John-Son's Portfolio
main.bio: I am a web developer from Hong Kong, The Netherlands. I am customer driven with a passion for results and always going the extra mile to get things done. I like being social with my colleagues and love to bring in some humor. I enjoy the process of creative problem-solving and want to understand complex issues. I love innovation and to bring original ideas to people. Seeing people enjoy what I made, or played a part in, is of utmost importance to me.

work.title: TedText
work.description: Texting Educational Data â€“ Rapid Knowledge Transfer and Assessment (TED-RKTA), provided by short message service (SMS, i.e., text messages) rapidly transfers knowledge, prepares learners and assesses knowledge decay. TED-RKTA equips Airmen and Sailors with a blended micro-learning and smartphone technology that is a comfortable environment that modern learners are already fluent in. Effortless learning through text messages. Micro-learning at the speed of texting. Use the power of texting to engage your students 24/7.
Need an experienced python Django developer to help us debug and complete an eCommerce website that allows us to securely sell and ship our products worldwide.

projects.title: Pomodoro Clock
projects.category: The clock can be started by pressing the top, blue, button. The clock will change color to green and the background will change into a motivating and concentration enhancing color during the work period and in a relaxing color in the rest period. At the end of each period an audio signal is given.
